reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty and true to size, with soft fabric and stretchiness that makes it comfortable to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and soft
items.body: Sizing is great. Fabric is so soft, I was worried it would be an itchy lace but it's not. It's a nice, soft fabric with some elasticity to it. Fit perfectly looks adorable ðŸ¤© Would buy from this company again. Read more
items.author: Rashelle Derheimer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: Canâ€™t wait to wear this dress. The pattern and colors are beautiful in person. The bronze/gold crystals are a really nice touch. It has a good weight to it and I like the length of the dress. I bought a XL plus in this dress and I was surprised to see that it fit, especially since I carry more weight in my midsection. Itâ€™s true to size, but if you want a looser fit size up. Overall Iâ€™m happy with the quality of the dress for the price I paid. Read more
items.author: MG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful dress, soft material, very comfortable. My daughter is on the Spectrum and has issues with abrasive materials. She was able to wear this to a concert and be comfortable the whole night. She even plans on wearing it again which for her is a definite win. She's 190, 5'5, and she got the xxl. Fit beautifully. Read more
items.author: Tashina Arthur

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars a lil sunshine and over the moon for this dress
items.body: I love how this fits, it's currently my favorite dress. My boobs look amazing in it and it's really smooth material. It fit super well the size is trust worthy. For reference, I'm 5'9" and 230lbs. For those of a similar body shape, I'll upload a photo next time I wear it, for reference. I get so many compliments with this dress. Critique: I wish the inside of the sleeves were the same fabric as the outside, so that when they rolll or hang, it's not the white part showing. Read more
items.author: R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressing for hubbyâ€™s retirement party
items.body: This dress was cute and I got compliments on it all night The fit was great Maybe a little lower than I expected but it was fine The price was perfect for my budget Loved that it was stretchy and not tight and itâ€™s did not ride up I was very comfortable all night in this dress Read more
items.author: CKDehesa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as pictured
items.body: Just as pictured! Good quality as well. Sort stretchy fabric, super flattering, true to size. I purchased for a 70s themed party and it was perfect. Fit the theme without being cheesy. Would definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress
items.body: Very cute. I also like to put a waist cincher on it. It looks very good on your midsection! Itâ€™s a little bit short, so tights would be cute under it. Definitely looks good in the chest area if you have a lot there! Material is very soft and stretchy Read more
items.author: Bekah1278

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not accommodating for bigger chests
items.body: So I guess they just donâ€™t size up the chest area for larger sizes. Not even half my boob fit into the breast pocket/design. It looked stupid having the seem across the top third of my boob. Only buy this if you are smaller chested. Read more
items.author: Elena

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Floral, Blue, Multi Boho Paisley, Multi Black, Orange Floral, Multicolor, Army Green, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Red, Brown Plaid, Brown Western Print, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
